com.communote.server.core.template

Class NoteTemplateDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.template.NoteTemplateDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityDefinition

    public class NoteTemplateDefinition
extends Object
    Apart from user generated content notes can also have predefined content that is based on a template. This object defines such a template.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoteTemplateDefinition(String templateId, LocalizedMessage templateName, LocalizedMessage template)
      Creates a new template definition with default expiration timeout of zero.
      NoteTemplateDefinition(String templateId, LocalizedMessage templateName, LocalizedMessage template, long expirationTimeout)
      Creates a new template definition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NoteTemplateDefinition

        public NoteTemplateDefinition(String templateId,
                              LocalizedMessage templateName,
                              LocalizedMessage template)
        Creates a new template definition with default expiration timeout of zero.
        Parameters:
        templateId - an ID which uniquely identifies the template
        templateName - a localizable name of the template
        template - the actual template. This will be the default template.

      • NoteTemplateDefinition

        public NoteTemplateDefinition(String templateId,
                              LocalizedMessage templateName,
                              LocalizedMessage template,
                              long expirationTimeout)
        Creates a new template definition.
        Parameters:
        templateId - an ID which uniquely identifies the template
        templateName - a localizable name of the template
        template - the actual template. This will be the default template.
        expirationTimeout - a timeout in milliseconds after which a note that uses this template should expire

    • Method Detail

      • addTemplate

        public void addTemplate(NoteRenderMode renderMode,
                        LocalizedMessage template)
        Allows overriding the default template for other render modes.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - the render mode for which the provided template should be used
        template - the template to use

      • getExpirationTimeout

        public long getExpirationTimeout()
        Returns:
        a timeout in milliseconds after which a note that uses this template should expire automatically. Expire in this context means that the note should be deleted automatically. A return value of zero or less means that the note won't expire.

      • getTemplate

        public LocalizedMessage getTemplate()
        Returns:
        the actual template. The template can be static or localizable text. The value of the template will be passed to a Velocity engine and thus can contain Velocity markup.

      • getTemplate

        public LocalizedMessage getTemplate(NoteRenderMode renderMode)
        Like getTemplate() but return a template that was explicitly added via addTemplate(NoteRenderMode, LocalizedMessage) for the given renderMode. If there is no template for that renderMode the default template will be returned.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - the renderMode for which the template should be retrieved, if null the default template is returned.
        Returns:
        the template

      • getTemplateId

        public String getTemplateId()
        Returns:
        an ID which uniquely identifies the template definition. For assigning a note with this template the templateId must be stored in the note properties.

      • getTemplateName

        public LocalizedMessage getTemplateName()
        Returns:
        a localizable name of the template. Could for instance be used for configuration screens and similar.

      • hasTemplate

        public boolean hasTemplate(NoteRenderMode renderMode)
        Test whether the definition has a template for the given render mode.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - the render mode to test
        Returns:
        true if a template was added via addTemplate(NoteRenderMode, LocalizedMessage) for the given render mode

      • removeTemplate

        public void removeTemplate(NoteRenderMode renderMode)
        Removes a template previously added with addTemplate(NoteRenderMode, LocalizedMessage). If there is no template for the renderMode nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - the renderMode for which an added template should be removed

      • setExpirationTimeout

        public void setExpirationTimeout(long timeout)
        Sets the expiration timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - a timeout in milliseconds after which a note that uses this template should expire (be deleted) automatically. A value of zero or less means no expiration.

      • setPropertiesValidator

        public void setPropertiesValidator(NoteTemplatePropertiesValidator validator)
        Sets the validator to be used for validating the template properties.
        Parameters:
        validator - the validator

      • validateProperties

        public void validateProperties(Map<String,Object> templatePropertiesJSON)
                        throws NoteTemplatePropertiesValidationException
        Validates the template properties using the validator of this definition, in case there is one.
        Parameters:
        templatePropertiesJSON - the JSON object, as nested map, holding the properties that should be validated, can be null. Any modifications made to the object won't be persisted.
        Throws:
        NoteTemplatePropertiesValidationException - in case the validation failed
